seo_content_home.en:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agricultural market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilisers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio-stimulants, sprayers, and other agricultural implements and farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.iffcobazar.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’. It offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agricultural market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agricultural uses, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offer the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agricultural market in India in the short time since its establishment.
seo_content_home.bn:
ইফকো বাজার হল একটি অনলাইন কৃষি বাজার এবং প্ল্যাটফর্ম যা ভারতীয় কৃষকদের একটি আধুনিক খুচরা অভিজ্ঞতা প্রদান করে। ইফকো বাজার-এ, আপনি একটি অনলাইন কৃষকের দোকানের পাশাপাশি চর্চা মঞ্চ, বিনামূল্যে মাটি পরীক্ষা এবং আরও অনেক কিছুর মতো পরিষেবাগুলিতে সহজে অ্যাক্সেস পান।

বীজ, সার, কীটনাশক, গবাদি পশুর খাদ্য, জৈব উদ্দীপক, স্প্রেয়ার এবং অন্যান্য কৃষি উপকরণের বিস্তৃত পরিসর থেকে বেছে নিন এবং সহজে অনলাইনে কৃষি পণ্য কিনুন।

 

অনলাইন এগ্রি স্টোর প্রতিষ্ঠা

ভারতের সমস্ত কৃষক এবং সমবায় সমিতিকে সংযুক্ত করার লক্ষ্যে, বিশ্বের বৃহত্তম সমবায়গুলির মধ্যে একটি, ইফকো, "www.iffcobazar.in" এগ্রি ই-কমার্স স্টোর চালু করেছে৷ 'ডিজিটাল ইন্ডিয়া'-এর সরকারের উদ্যোগের সাথে সঙ্গতি রেখে প্ল্যাটফর্মটি চালু করা হয়েছিল এবং এটি নিখুঁত প্ল্যাটফর্ম অফার করে যা ইফকো এবং এর যৌথ উদ্যোগ, গ্রাহকদের সাথে এবং বিভিন্ন সমাজের মধ্যে নির্বিঘ্ন যোগাযোগ এবং বাণিজ্যের অনুমতি দেয়।

প্ল্যাটফর্মটি ইংরেজি এবং হিন্দি সহ ১২টি বিভিন্ন আঞ্চলিক ভাষায় উপলব্ধ যা গ্রামীণ ভারত এবং দেশের বাকি অংশের মধ্যে অনায়াসে সংযোগ নিশ্চিত করে।

দেশের কৃষকদের তাদের ব্যবসার বাণিজ্যিক দিকটির উপর আরও নিয়ন্ত্রণ রাখার জন্য ক্ষমতায়নের জন্য, এই অনলাইন এগ্রি স্টোরটি বিনামূল্যে হোম ডেলিভারি স্কিম, ক্যাশ অন ডেলিভারি এবং ভারতের গ্রামীণ অঞ্চলের জন্য ন্যূনতম অর্ডার মূল্যের মতো বিভিন্ন সুবিধাও অফার করে।

 

ইফকো বাজারের বৈশিষ্ট্য

ভারতীয় কৃষক এবং দেশের গ্রামীণ সমাজকে সম্পূর্ণ সুবিধা দেওয়ার জন্য ডিজাইন করা হয়েছে, ইফকো বাজার যা ১২টি আঞ্চলিক ভাষায় উপলব্ধ। এর মধ্যে রয়েছে হিন্দি, ইংরেজি, বাংলা, মারাঠি, গুজরাটি, পাঞ্জাবি, তেলেগু, তামিল, কন্নড়, মালয়ালম, অসমীয়া এবং ওড়িয়া। আঞ্চলিক ভাষায় প্রাপ্যতা অনলাইন এগ্রি স্টোরের বিস্তৃত নাগাল নিশ্চিত করতে সাহায্য করে এবং লোকেরা যেখানেই থাকুন না কেন অনলাইনে কৃষি পণ্য কেনার জন্য এটি অত্যন্ত সহজ করে তোলে।

 

প্ল্যাটফর্মটি কেবলমাত্র তাদের মোবাইল নম্বর ব্যবহার করে সমাজ এবং ব্যক্তিদের জন্য সহজ নিবন্ধন অফার করে এবং প্ল্যাটফর্ম এবং এর বিভিন্ন স্কিম, ব্যক্তিদের জন্য ব্যবসা এবং ক্যারিয়ারের সুযোগ সম্পর্কে সম্মিলিত তথ্য সরবরাহ করে।

 

কৃষির জন্য সেরা অনলাইন শপিং ওয়েবসাইটগুলির মধ্যে একটি, লোকেরা আলোচনার ফোরামগুলিতেও অ্যাক্সেস পায় যেখানে তারা সহজেই প্রশ্ন জিজ্ঞাসা করতে বা ধারনা এবং সেরা অনুশীলনগুলি ভাগ করতে পারে। ফোরামে এমন সুবিধাও রয়েছে যা প্রত্যেকের জন্য একটি ইন্টারেক্টিভ অভিজ্ঞতা নিশ্চিত করতে মন্তব্য এবং ভোট দেওয়ার অনুমতি দেয়।

 

ইফকো বাজার প্ল্যাটফর্ম এবং এর অনলাইন কৃষকদের স্টোরের একটি অত্যন্ত গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বৈশিষ্ট্য হল কিষাণমিত্র -ফ্রেন্ডস অফ দ্য ফার্মার্স প্রকল্প। ভারত সরকারের প্রধান বৈজ্ঞানিক উপদেষ্টার অফিসের একটি উদ্যোগ, এই প্রকল্পের লক্ষ্য হল ভারতীয় কৃষকদের আরও স্বনির্ভর হতে সাহায্য করা, তাদের অন্তর্দৃষ্টি এবং সুপারিশগুলি অফার করা যা সরকারের বিভিন্ন বিভাগের অসংখ্য তথ্য উত্স থেকে সংগ্রহ করা তথ্যের উপর ভিত্তি করে।

 

ইফকো বাজার দ্বারা অফার করা অন্যান্য বৈশিষ্ট্য যা এটিকে আজকে ভারতীয় কৃষকদের জন্য সেরা অনলাইন কৃষি বাজারকে উপলব্ধ করে তুলেছে, এর মধ্যে রয়েছে ভিডিও, ব্লগ এবং অন্যান্য বিষয়বস্তুর সাথে নিজে নিজে শেখার ক্ষমতা যেমন কৃষিকাজ বা জীবজন্তু লালন-পালনের সর্বোত্তম অনুশীলন, মাটি পরীক্ষা। , ক্যাশলেস পেমেন্টের উপায়, এবং তাই; ইফকো এবং এর যৌথ উদ্যোগের সমস্ত উল্লম্ব দ্বারা প্রদত্ত পণ্য এবং পরিষেবাগুলির জন্য অনলাইন কেনার সুবিধা; কৃষকদের মিলন, চিকিৎসা বা পশুচিকিৎসা পরীক্ষা সহ ভবিষ্যত ইভেন্ট সংক্রান্ত তথ্যের অ্যাক্সেস; এবং আরো অনেক কিছু.

 

ইফকো বাজার-এ পেমেন্ট সম্পর্কে

কৃষির জন্য শীর্ষস্থানীয় অনলাইন শপিং ওয়েবসাইটগুলির মধ্যে একটি, ইফকো বাজার ক্রেডিট বা ডেবিট কার্ড এবং ইন্টারনেট ব্যাঙ্কিং সহ অনলাইন পেমেন্ট প্রক্রিয়াকরণের জন্য নিরাপদ এবং নিরাপদ উপায়গুলির সাথে ক্যাশ অন ডেলিভারি অফার করে৷ ইফকো বাজার আপনার অর্থপ্রদানের তথ্যের জন্য সম্পূর্ণ নিরাপদ লেনদেন এবং গোপনীয়তার গ্যারান্টি দেয়। এই বৈশিষ্ট্যগুলি এবং আরও অনেক কিছু সহ, আমরা ভারতীয় কৃষকদের সর্বোত্তম পরিষেবা প্রদানের জন্য নিবেদিত, তাদের ব্যবসার নিয়ন্ত্রণ নিতে তাদের ক্ষমতায়ন করতে। এই কারণে, ইফকো বাজার প্রতিষ্ঠার পর থেকে অল্প সময়ের মধ্যে ভারতের শীর্ষ অনলাইন কৃষি বাজার হয়ে উঠেছে।
seo_content_home.hi:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agricultural market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilisers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio-stimulants, sprayers, and other agricultural implements and farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.iffcobazar.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’. It offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agricultural market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agricultural uses, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offer the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agricultural market in India in the short time since its establishment.

seo_content_home.gu:
ઇફકો બજારએ એક ઑનલાઇન કૃષિ બજાર છે જે ભારતીય ખેડૂતોને આધુનિક છૂટક અનુભવ પ્રદાન કરતું પ્લેટફોર્મ  છે. ઇફકો બજાર પર, તમે ખેડૂતોના ઑનલાઇન સ્ટોર, ચર્ચા મંચ, મફત માટી પરીક્ષણ તેમજ ઘણી બધી બીજી સેવાઓની સરળ ઍક્સેસ મેળવી શકો

બિયારણ, ખાતર, જંતુનાશકો, પશુ આહાર, જૈવ ઉત્તેજકો, સ્પ્રેયર્સ અને અન્ય કૃષિ ઓજારોની વિશાળ શ્રેણીમાંથી પસંદ કરો અને ખેતીના ઉત્પાદનોને સરળતાથી ખરીદો.

 

ઓનલાઈન એગ્રી સ્ટોરની સ્થાપના

ભારતમાં તમામ ખેડૂતો અને સહકારી મંડળીઓને જોડવાના ઉદ્દેશ્ય સાથે, વિશ્વની સૌથી મોટી સહકારી સંસ્થાઓમાંની એક ઇફકોએ www.iffcobazar.in એગ્રી ઈ-કોમર્સ સ્ટોર શરૂ કર્યો. આ પ્લેટફોર્મ સરકારની 'ડિજિટલ ઈન્ડિયા'ની પહેલને અનુરૂપ લોન્ચ કરવામાં આવ્યું હતું અને તે સંપૂર્ણ પ્લેટફોર્મ ઓફર કરે છે જે ઇફકો અને તેના સંયુક્ત સાહસો, ગ્રાહકો સાથે અને વિવિધ સોસાયટીઓ વચ્ચે સીમલેસ કોમ્યુનિકેશન અને કોમર્સ માટે પરવાનગી આપે છે.

આ પ્લેટફોર્મ અંગ્રેજી અને હિન્દી સહિત ૧૨ વિવિધ પ્રાદેશિક ભાષાઓમાં ઉપલબ્ધ છે જે ગ્રામીણ ભારત અને બાકીના દેશ વચ્ચે સહેલાઈથી કનેક્ટિવિટી સુનિશ્ચિત કરે છે.

દેશના ખેડૂતોને તેમના વ્યવસાયના વ્યાપારી પાસાઓ પર વધુ નિયંત્રણ રાખવા માટે સશક્ત બનાવવા માટે, આ ઑનલાઇન એગ્રી સ્ટોર મફત હોમ ડિલિવરી સ્કીમ, ડિલિવરી પર રોકડ અને ભારતના ગ્રામીણ વિસ્તારો માટે કોઈ ન્યૂનતમ ઓર્ડર મૂલ્ય જેવા ઘણા લાભો પણ પ્રદાન કરે છે.

 

ઇફકો બજારની વિશેષતાઓ  

ભારતીય ખેડૂતો અને દેશના ગ્રામીણ સમાજોને સંપૂર્ણ સુવિધા આપવા માટે રચાયેલ, ઇફકો બજાર ૧૨ પ્રાદેશિક ભાષાઓમાં ઉપલબ્ધ છે. આમાં હિન્દી, અંગ્રેજી, બંગાળી, મરાઠી, ગુજરાતી, પંજાબી, તેલુગુ, તમિલ, કન્નડ, મલયાલમ, આસામી અને ઉડિયાનો સમાવેશ થાય છે. પ્રાદેશિક ભાષાઓમાં ઉપલબ્ધતા ઓનલાઈન એગ્રી સ્ટોરની વ્યાપક પહોંચ સુનિશ્ચિત કરવામાં મદદ કરે છે અને લોકો જ્યાં પણ હોય ત્યાંથી ઓનલાઈન ખેત ઉત્પાદનો ખરીદવાનું અત્યંત સરળ બનાવે છે.

 

આ પ્લેટફોર્મ સોસાયટીઓ અને વ્યક્તિઓ માટે માત્ર તેમના મોબાઈલ નંબરનો ઉપયોગ કરીને સરળતાથી નોંધણી કરાવે છે અને તેની વિવિધ યોજનાઓ, વ્યક્તિઓ માટે વ્યવસાય અને કારકિર્દીની તકો વિશે સામૂહિક માહિતી પ્રદાન કરતું પ્લેટફોર્મ છે.

 

કૃષિ માટેની શ્રેષ્ઠ ઓનલાઈન શોપિંગ વેબસાઈટમાંની એક છે, જેમાં લોકોને ચર્ચા મંચ પર પણ પ્રવેશ મળે છે જ્યાં તેઓ સરળતાથી પ્રશ્નો પૂછી શકે છે અથવા વિચારો અને શ્રેષ્ઠ પ્રયાસો શેર કરી શકે છે. ફોરમમાં એવી સુવિધાઓ પણ છે જે દરેક માટે ઇન્ટરેક્ટિવ અનુભવ સુનિશ્ચિત કરવા ટિપ્પણી અને મતદાન કરવાની મંજૂરી આપે છે.

 

ઇફકો બજાર પ્લેટફોર્મ અને તેના ઓનલાઈન ખેડૂતોના સ્ટોરની એક ખૂબ જ મહત્વપૂર્ણ વિશેષતા કિસાનમિત્ર - ફ્રેન્ડ્સ ઑફ ધ ફાર્મર્સ પ્રોજેક્ટ છે. પ્રિન્સિપલ સાયન્ટિફિક એડવાઈઝર, ભારત સરકારના કાર્યાલય દ્વારા એક પહેલ, આ પ્રોજેક્ટનો ઉદ્દેશ્ય ભારતીય ખેડૂતોને વધુ આત્મનિર્ભર બનવામાં મદદ કરવાનો છે, તેઓને સરકારના વિવિધ વિભાગોમાંથી અસંખ્ય ડેટા સ્ત્રોતોમાંથી મેળવેલ માહિતી પર આધારિત આંતરદૃષ્ટિ અને ભલામણો પ્રદાન કરે છે.

 

ઇફકો બજાર દ્વારા ઓફર કરવામાં આવતી અન્ય વિશેષતાઓ જે તેને આજે ભારતીય ખેડૂતો માટે શ્રેષ્ઠ ઓનલાઈન કૃષિ બજાર ઉપલબ્ધ બનાવે છે તેમાં વિડીયો, બ્લોગ્સ અને ખેતીની શ્રેષ્ઠ પદ્ધતિઓ, માટી પરીક્ષણ જેવા વિષયો પર જાતે શીખવાની ક્ષમતાઓનો સમાવેશ થાય છે. , કેશલેસ ચૂકવણીના માધ્યમો, વગેરે; ઇફકો અને તેના સંયુક્ત સાહસોના તમામ વર્ટિકલ્સ દ્વારા ઓફર કરવામાં આવતા ઉત્પાદનો અને સેવાઓ માટે ઑનલાઇન ખરીદીની સુવિધાઓ; ખેડૂતોની મીટ, મેડિકલ અથવા વેટરનરી ચેક-અપ સહિતની ભવિષ્યની ઘટનાઓ સંબંધિત માહિતીની ઍક્સેસ અને ઘણું બધું મેળવી શકો.

 

ઇફકો બજાર ખાતે ચૂકવણી વિશે

ઈફ્કો બજાર એ કૃષિ માટેની ટોચની ઓનલાઈન શોપિંગ વેબસાઈટમાંની એક છે, તે ક્રેડિટ અથવા ડેબિટ કાર્ડ અને ઈન્ટરનેટ બેન્કિંગ સહિત ઓનલાઈન પેમેન્ટની પ્રક્રિયા કરવા માટે સુરક્ષિત અને સુરક્ષિત માર્ગો સાથે કેશ ઓન ડિલિવરી ઓફર કરે છે. ઇફકો બજાર તમારી ચુકવણી માહિતી માટે સંપૂર્ણપણે સલામત વ્યવહારો અને ગુપ્તતાની ખાતરી આપે છે. આ વિશેષતાઓ અને ઘણું બધું સાથે, અમે ભારતીય ખેડૂતોને શ્રેષ્ઠ સેવાઓ પ્રદાન કરવા માટે સમર્પિત છીએ, તેમને તેમના વ્યવસાય પર નિયંત્રણ મેળવવા માટે સશક્તિકરણ કરીએ છીએ. આના કારણે, ઇફકો બજાર તેની સ્થાપના પછીના ટૂંકા સમયમાં ભારતમાં ટોચનું ઓનલાઈન કૃષિ બજાર બની ગયું છે.
seo_content_home.ur:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agricultural market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilisers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio-stimulants, sprayers, and other agricultural implements and farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.iffcobazar.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’. It offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agricultural market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agricultural uses, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offer the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agricultural market in India in the short time since its establishment.

seo_content_home.or:
IFFCO ବଜାର ହେଉଛି ଏକ ଅନଲାଇନ୍ କୃଷି ବଜାର ଏବଂ ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ ଯାହା ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକମାନଙ୍କୁ ଏକ ଆଧୁନିକ ଖୁଚୁରା ଅଭିଜ୍ଞତା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ| IFFCO BAZAR ରେ, ଆପଣ ଏକ ଅନଲାଇନ୍ କୃଷକ ଦୋକାନକୁ ସହଜ ପ୍ରବେଶ କରିବା ସହିତ ଚର୍ଚା ମଞ୍ଚ, ମାଗଣା ମୃତ୍ତିକା ପରୀକ୍ଷଣ ଏବଂ ଅନେକ କିଛି ସେବା ପାଇପାରିବେ|

ବିଭିନ୍ନ ପ୍ରକାରର ମଞ୍ଜି, ସାର, କୀଟନାଶକ,ଗୋଖାଦ୍ୟ, ବାୟୋ ଉତ୍ତେଜକ, ସ୍ପ୍ରେର୍ ଏବଂ ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ଏଗ୍ରି ଉପକରଣରୁ ବାଛନ୍ତୁ ଏବଂ ସହଜରେ ଚାଷଜମି  ପାଇଁ  ଉପକରଣ କ୍ରୟ କରନ୍ତୁ|

 

ଅନ୍ଲାଇନ୍ ଏଗ୍ରି ଷ୍ଟୋର୍‌ର ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠା

ଭାରତର ସମସ୍ତ କୃଷକ ଏବଂ ସମବାୟ ସମିତିକୁ ସଂଯୋଗ କରିବା ଲକ୍ଷ୍ୟରେ, ବିଶ୍ୱର ବୃହତ୍ତମ ସମବାୟ ସମିତି ମଧ୍ୟରୁ IFFCO, “www.iffcobazar.in” ଆଗ୍ରି ଇ-କମର୍ସ ଷ୍ଟୋର୍‌ ଆରମ୍ଭ କଲା| ସରକାରଙ୍କ ‘ଡିଜିଟାଲ୍ ଇଣ୍ଡିଆ’ର ପଦକ୍ଷେପ ଅନୁଯାୟୀ ଏହି ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ ଉନ୍ମୋଚିତ ହୋଇଥିଲା ଏବଂ ଏହା ଏକ ଉପଯୁକ୍ତ ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ ଯାହା IFFCO ଏବଂ ଏହାର ମିଳିତ ଭେଞ୍ଚର, ଗ୍ରାହକ ଏବଂ ବିଭିନ୍ନ ସମାଜ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ନିରନ୍ତର ଯୋଗାଯୋଗ ଏବଂ ବାଣିଜ୍ୟ ପାଇଁ ଅନୁମତି ଦେଇଥାଏ|

ଏହି ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମଟି ଇଂରାଜୀ ଏବଂ ହିନ୍ଦୀ ସମେତ 12 ଟି ବିଭିନ୍ନ ଆଞ୍ଚଳିକ ଭାଷାରେ ଉପଲବ୍ଧ ଯାହା ଗ୍ରାମାଞ୍ଚଳ ଭାରତ ଏବଂ ଦେଶର ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ଦେଶ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଅଯଥା ସଂଯୋଗକୁ ସୁନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରେ|

ଦେଶର କୃଷକମାନଙ୍କୁ ସେମାନଙ୍କ ବ୍ୟବସାୟର ବାଣିଜ୍ୟିକ ଦିଗ ଉପରେ ଅଧିକ ନିୟନ୍ତ୍ରଣ ରଖିବାରେ ସଶକ୍ତ କରିବାକୁ, ଏହି ଅନଲାଇନ୍ ଆଗ୍ରି ଷ୍ଟୋର୍‌ରେ ମାଗଣାରେ ଘରକୁ  ଜିନିଷ  ପଠାଇବା , ଜିନିଷ  ପାଇଲା ପରେ ଟଙ୍କା  ଆଣିବା  ଏବଂ ଭାରତର ଗ୍ରାମାଞ୍ଚଳ ପାଇଁ ସର୍ବନିମ୍ନ ଅର୍ଡର ମୂଲ୍ୟ ଭଳି ଅନେକ ସୁବିଧା ମଧ୍ୟ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରାଯାଇଥାଏ| 

 

IFFCO ବଜାରର ବଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟଗୁଡିକ

ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକ ଏବଂ ଦେଶର ଗ୍ରାମୀଣ ସମାଜକୁ ସମ୍ପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ସୁବିଧା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବାକୁ  IFFCO ବଜାର ଡିଜାଇନ୍ ହୋଇଥିବା 12 ଟି ଆଞ୍ଚଳିକ ଭାଷାରେ ଉପଲବ୍ଧ ଅଟେ| ଏଥିରେ ହିନ୍ଦୀ, ଇଂରାଜୀ, ବଙ୍ଗାଳୀ, ମରାଠୀ, ଗୁଜରାଟୀ, ପଞ୍ଜାବୀ, ତେଲୁଗୁ, ତାମିଲ, କନ୍ନଡ, ମାଲାୟାଲମ୍, ଆସାମ ଏବଂ ଓଡିଆ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଭୁକ୍ତ ଅଟେ| ଆଞ୍ଚଳିକ ଭାଷାରେ ଉପଲବ୍ଧତା ଅନଲାଇନ୍ ଏଗ୍ରି ଷ୍ଟୋର୍‌ ପାଇଁ ଏକ ବ୍ୟାପକ ପ୍ରସାର ସୁନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରିବାରେ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରେ ଏବଂ ଲୋକମାନେ ଯେଉଁଆଡେ ଥାଆନ୍ତି ଅନଲାଇନରେ ଫାର୍ମ ଉତ୍ପାଦ କିଣିବା ଅତ୍ୟନ୍ତ ସହଜ କରିଥାଏ|

 

ଏହି ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ କେବଳ ମୋବାଇଲ୍ ନମ୍ବର ବ୍ୟବହାର କରୁଥିବା ସମାଜ ଏବଂ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତିବିଶେଷଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ସହଜ ପଞ୍ଜୀକରଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ ଏବଂ ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ ବିଷୟରେ  ଏବଂ ଏହାର ବିଭିନ୍ନ ଯୋଜନା, ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ଏବଂ ବ୍ୟକ୍ତିବିଶେଷଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ବୃତ୍ତି ସୁଯୋଗ ବିଷୟରେ ସାମୂହିକ ସୂଚନା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିଥାଏ|

 

କୃଷି ପାଇଁ ସର୍ବୋତ୍ତମ ଅନଲାଇନ୍ ସପିଂ ୱେବସାଇଟ୍ ମଧ୍ୟରୁ ଲୋକମାନେ ଆଲୋଚନା ଫୋରମ୍କୁ ମଧ୍ୟ ପ୍ରବେଶ କରନ୍ତି ଯେଉଁଠାରେ ସେମାନେ ସହଜରେ ପ୍ରଶ୍ନ ପଚାରିପାରନ୍ତି କିମ୍ବା ଧାରଣା ଏବଂ ସର୍ବୋତ୍ତମ ଅଭ୍ୟାସ ବାଣ୍ଟିପାରନ୍ତି| ଫୋରମ୍ରେ ମଧ୍ୟ ସୁବିଧା ଅଛି ଯାହା ସମସ୍ତଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ଏକ ଇଣ୍ଟରାକ୍ଟିଭ୍ ଅନୁଭୂତି ନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରିବାକୁ ମନ୍ତବ୍ୟ ଏବଂ ଭୋଟ୍ ଦେବାକୁ ଅନୁମତି ଦିଏ|

 

IFFCO BAZAR ପ୍ଲାଟଫର୍ମ ଏବଂ ଏହାର ଅନଲାଇନ୍ କୃଷକ ଷ୍ଟୋର୍‌ର ଏକ ଗୁରୁତ୍ୱପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ବଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟ ହେଉଛି କିସାନମିତ୍ର - ଫ୍ରେଣ୍ଡସ୍ ଅଫ୍ ଫାର୍ମର୍ସ ପ୍ରୋଜେକ୍ଟ| ଭାରତ ସରକାରଙ୍କ ମୁଖ୍ୟ ବୈଜ୍ଞାନିକ ପରାମର୍ଶଦାତା କାର୍ଯ୍ୟାଳୟର ଏକ ପଦକ୍ଷେପ, ଏହି ପ୍ରକଳ୍ପଟି ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକମାନଙ୍କୁ ଅଧିକ ଆତ୍ମନିର୍ଭରଶୀଳ ହେବାରେ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଉଦ୍ଦିଷ୍ଟ, ଯାହା ସେମାନଙ୍କୁ ସରକାରଙ୍କ ବିଭିନ୍ନ ବିଭାଗର ଅନେକ ତଥ୍ୟ ଉତ୍ସରୁ ମିଳିଥିବା ସୂଚନା ଉପରେ ଆଧାର କରି ଅନ୍ତର୍ନିହିତ ତଥା ସୁପାରିଶ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିଥାଏ|

 

IFFCO BAZAR ଦ୍ୱାରା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରାଯାଇଥିବା ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ବଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟ ଯାହା ଏହାକୁ ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକମାନଙ୍କ ପାଇଁ ସର୍ବୋତ୍ତମ ଅନଲାଇନ୍ କୃଷି ବଜାର ଭାବରେ ଉପଲବ୍ଧ କରାଏ, ଭିଡିଓ, ବ୍ଲଗ୍ ଏବଂ ଅନ୍ୟାନ୍ୟ ବିଷୟବସ୍ତୁ ସହିତ ଚାଷ କିମ୍ବା ଗାଈଗୋରୁ ପାଳିବା, ମୃତ୍ତିକା ପରୀକ୍ଷଣ ଭଳି ବିଷୟବସ୍ତୁ ଉପରେ ଶିଖିବା ଦ୍ୱାରା ଆତ୍ମ-ଦକ୍ଷତା ଅନ୍ତର୍ଭୁକ୍ତ କରେ| ନଗଦବିହୀନ ଦେୟର ମାଧ୍ୟମ, ଇତ୍ୟାଦି; IFFCO ର ସମସ୍ତ ଭର୍ଟିକାଲ୍ ଏବଂ ଏହାର ଯୁଗ୍ମ ଭେଣ୍ଟର୍ସ ଦ୍ୱାରା ଦିଆଯାଇଥିବା ଉତ୍ପାଦ ଏବଂ ସେବା ପାଇଁ ଅନ୍ଲାଇନ୍ କ୍ରୟ ସୁବିଧା; ଭବିଷ୍ୟତର ଘଟଣାଗୁଡ଼ିକ ସମ୍ବନ୍ଧରେ ସୂଚନା ପାଇବାକୁ, କୃଷକମାନେ ସାକ୍ଷାତ, ଡାକ୍ତରୀ କିମ୍ବା ପ୍ରାଣୀ ଚିକିତ୍ସା ଯାଞ୍ଚ ସହିତ; ଏବଂ ଆହୁରି ଅନେକ| 

 

IFFCO ବଜାର ରେ ଦେୟ ବିଷୟରେ

କୃଷି ପାଇଁ ସବୁଠୁ ଶୀର୍ଷ ଅନ୍ଲାଇନ୍ ସପିଂ ୱେବସାଇଟ୍ ମଧ୍ୟରୁ IFFCO BAZAR କ୍ରେଡିଟ୍ କିମ୍ବା ଡେବିଟ୍ କାର୍ଡ ଏବଂ ଇଣ୍ଟରନେଟ୍ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କିଙ୍ଗ୍ ସହିତ ଅନ୍ଲାଇନ୍ ପେମେଣ୍ଟ୍ ପ୍ରକ୍ରିୟାକରଣ ପାଇଁ ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ ଏବଂ ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ ଉପାୟ ସହିତ କ୍ୟାଶ୍ ଅନ୍ ଡେଲିଭରୀ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିଥାଏ| IFFCO BAZAR ଆପଣଙ୍କ ଦେୟ ସୂଚନା ପାଇଁ ସଂପୂର୍ଣ୍ଣ ସୁରକ୍ଷିତ କାରବାର ଏବଂ ଗୋପନୀୟତାକୁ ନିଶ୍ଚିତ କରେ| ଏହି ବଶିଷ୍ଟ୍ୟଗୁଡିକ ଏବଂ ଆହୁରି ଅନେକ ସହିତ, ଆମେ ଭାରତୀୟ କୃଷକମାନଙ୍କୁ ସର୍ବୋତ୍ତମ ସେବା ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବାକୁ ଉତ୍ସର୍ଗୀକୃତ, ସେମାନଙ୍କୁ ସେମାନଙ୍କର ବ୍ୟବସାୟକୁ ନିୟନ୍ତ୍ରଣ କରିବାକୁ ସଶକ୍ତ କରୁ| ଏହି କାରଣରୁ, IFFCO ବଜାର ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠା ହେବାର ଅଳ୍ପ ସମୟ ମଧ୍ୟରେ ଭାରତର ଶୀର୍ଷ ଅନଲାଇନ୍ କୃଷି ବଜାରରେ ପରିଣତ ହୋଇଛି|

ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ ഇന്ത്യൻ കർഷകർക്ക് ആധുനിക റീട്ടെയിൽ അനുഭവം പ്രദാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന ഒരു ഓൺലൈൻ കാർഷിക വിപണിയും പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോമുമാണ്. ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ-ൽ, കർഷകരുടെ ഓൺലൈൻ സ്റ്റോറിലേക്കും ചർച്ചാ മഞ്ച്, സൗജന്യ മണ്ണ് പരിശോധന തുടങ്ങിയ സേവനങ്ങളിലേക്കും നിങ്ങൾക്ക് എളുപ്പത്തിൽ ആക്സസ് ലഭിക്കും.വിത്തുകൾ, വളങ്ങൾ, കീടനാശിനികൾ, കാലിത്തീറ്റ, ജൈവ ഉത്തേജകങ്ങൾ, സ്പ്രേയറുകൾ, മറ്റ് കാർഷിക ഉപകരണങ്ങൾ എന്നിവയിൽ നിന്ന് തിരഞ്ഞെടുത്ത് കാർഷിക ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾ ഓൺലൈനിൽ എളുപ്പത്തിൽ വാങ്ങുക.

 

ഓൺലൈൻ അഗ്രി സ്റ്റോറിന്റെ സ്ഥാപനം

ഇന്ത്യയിലെ എല്ലാ കർഷകരെയും സഹകരണ സംഘങ്ങളെയും ബന്ധിപ്പിക്കുക എന്ന ലക്ഷ്യത്തോടെ, ലോകത്തിലെ ഏറ്റവും വലിയ സഹകരണ സ്ഥാപനങ്ങളിൽ ഒന്നായ ഇഫ്‌കോ, "www.iffcobazar.in" അഗ്രി ഇ-കൊമേഴ്‌സ് സ്റ്റോർ

ആരംഭിച്ചു. ‘ഡിജിറ്റൽ ഇന്ത്യഎന്ന ഗവൺമെന്റിന്റെ മുൻകൈയ്‌ക്ക് അനുസൃതമായാണ് പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോം ആരംഭിച്ചത് കൂടാതെ ഇഫ്‌കോയും അതിന്റെ സംയുക്ത സംരംഭങ്ങളും ഉപഭോക്താക്കളുമായും വിവിധ സമൂഹങ്ങൾക്കിടയിലും തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത ആശയവിനിമയവും വാണിജ്യവും അനുവദിക്കുന്ന മികച്ച പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോം വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നു.ഇംഗ്ലീഷും ഹിന്ദിയും ഉൾപ്പെടെ 12 വ്യത്യസ്‌ത പ്രാദേശിക ഭാഷകളിൽ പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോം ലഭ്യമാണ്, ഇത് ഗ്രാമീണ ഇന്ത്യയും രാജ്യത്തിന്റെ മറ്റ് ഭാഗങ്ങളും തമ്മിൽ അനായാസമായ കണക്റ്റിവിറ്റി ഉറപ്പാക്കുന്നു.രാജ്യത്തെ കർഷകർക്ക് അവരുടെ ബിസിനസുകളുടെ വാണിജ്യപരമായ വശങ്ങൾക്ക് കൂടുതൽ നിയന്ത്രണം നൽകുന്നതിന്, ഈ ഓൺലൈൻ അഗ്രി സ്റ്റോർ, സൗജന്യ ഹോം ഡെലിവറി സ്കീം, ക്യാഷ് ഓൺ ഡെലിവറി, ഇന്ത്യയിലെ ഗ്രാമീണ മേഖലകളിൽ മിനിമം ഓർഡർ മൂല്യം എന്നിവ പോലുള്ള നിരവധി ആനുകൂല്യങ്ങളും വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നു. .

 

ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ-ന്റെ സവിശേഷതകൾ

ഇന്ത്യൻ കർഷകർക്കും രാജ്യത്തെ ഗ്രാമീണ സമൂഹങ്ങൾക്കും പൂർണ്ണമായ സൗകര്യം പ്രദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നതിനായി രൂപകൽപ്പന ചെയ്‌തിരിക്കുന്ന ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ 12 പ്രാദേശിക ഭാഷകളിൽ ലഭ്യമാണ്. ഇതിൽ ഹിന്ദി, ഇംഗ്ലീഷ്, ബംഗാളി, മറാത്തി, ഗുജറാത്തി, പഞ്ചാബി, തെലുങ്ക്, തമിഴ്, കന്നഡ, മലയാളം, ആസാമീസ്, ഒറിയ എന്നിവ ഉൾപ്പെടുന്നു. പ്രാദേശിക ഭാഷകളിലെ ലഭ്യത, ഓൺലൈൻ അഗ്രി സ്റ്റോറിന് വ്യാപകമായ വ്യാപനം ഉറപ്പാക്കാൻ സഹായിക്കുകയും ആളുകൾക്ക് അവർ എവിടെയായിരുന്നാലും കാർഷിക ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾ ഓൺലൈനായി വാങ്ങുന്നത് വളരെ എളുപ്പമാക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുന്നു.

 

സൊസൈറ്റികൾക്കും വ്യക്തികൾക്കും അവരുടെ മൊബൈൽ നമ്പർ മാത്രം ഉപയോഗിച്ച് എളുപ്പമുള്ള രജിസ്ട്രേഷൻ പ്ലാറ്റ്ഫോം വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നു, കൂടാതെ പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോമിനെയും അതിന്റെ വിവിധ പദ്ധതികളെയും വ്യക്തികൾക്കുള്ള ബിസിനസ്, തൊഴിൽ അവസരങ്ങളെയും കുറിച്ചുള്ള കൂട്ടായ വിവരങ്ങൾ വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നു.

 

കാർഷിക മേഖലയ്‌ക്കായുള/മികച്ച ഓൺലൈൻ ഷോപ്പിംഗ് വെബ്‌സൈറ്റുകളിലൊന്നയ ആളുകൾക്ക് ചർച്ചാ ഫോറങ്ങളിലേക്കും ആക്‌സസ് ലഭിക്കും, അവിടെ അവർക്ക് എളുപ്പത്തിൽ ചോദ്യങ്ങൾ ചോദിക്കാനോ ആശയങ്ങളും മികച്ച രീതികളും പങ്കിടാനോ കഴിയും. എല്ലാവർക്കും ഒരു സംവേദനാത്മക അനുഭവം ഉറപ്പാക്കുന്നതിന് അഭിപ്രായമിടാനും വോട്ടുചെയ്യാനും അനുവദിക്കുന്ന സൗകര്യങ്ങളും

 

ഫോറത്തിലുണ്ട്.ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ പ്ലാറ്റ്‌ഫോമിന്റെയും അതിന്റെ ഓൺലൈൻ കർഷകരുടെ സ്‌റ്റോറിന്റെയും വളരെ പ്രധാനപ്പെട്ട സവിശേഷത കിസാൻമിത്ർ-ഫ്രണ്ട്സ് ഓഫ് ഫാർമേഴ്‌സ് പ്രോജക്ടാണ്. ഗവൺമെന്റിന്റെ പ്രിൻസിപ്പൽ സയന്റിഫിക് അഡൈ്വസറുടെ ഓഫീസിന്റെ ഒരു സംരംഭം, ഗവൺമെന്റിന്റെ വിവിധ വകുപ്പുകളിൽ നിന്നുള്ള നിരവധി ഡാറ്റാ സ്രോതസ്സുകളിൽ നിന്ന് ശേഖരിച്ച വിവരങ്ങളെ അടിസ്ഥാനമാക്കിയുള്ള ഉൾക്കാഴ്ചകളും ശുപാർശകളും വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന ഇന്ത്യൻ കർഷകരെ കൂടുതൽ സ്വാശ്രയരാക്കുന്നതിന് സഹായിക്കുകയെന്നതാണ് ഈ പദ്ധതി ലക്ഷ്യമിടുന്നത്.

 

ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന മറ്റ് ഫീച്ചറുകളിൽ, ഇന്ന് ഇന്ത്യൻ കർഷകർക്ക് ലഭ്യമാകുന്ന മികച്ച ഓൺലൈൻ കാർഷിക വിപണി ആക്കി മാറ്റുന്നത്, വീഡിയോകൾ, ബ്ലോഗുകൾ, മറ്റ് ഉള്ളടക്കങ്ങൾ എന്നിവ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് സ്വയം പഠിക്കാനുള്ള കഴിവുകളും കൃഷിയിലോ കൃഷിയിലോ തത്സമയ സ്റ്റോക്ക് വളർത്തുന്നതിലോ ഉള്ള മികച്ച രീതികൾ, മണ്ണ് പരിശോധന എന്നിവ ഉൾപ്പെടുന്നു. , പണമില്ലാത്ത പേയ്‌മെന്റുകളുടെ മാർഗങ്ങൾ മുതലായവ; ഇഫ്‌കോയുടെയും അതിന്റെ സംയുക്ത സംരംഭങ്ങളുടെയും എല്ലാ ലംബങ്ങളും വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്ന ഉൽപ്പന്നങ്ങൾക്കും സേവനങ്ങൾക്കുമായി ഓൺലൈൻ വാങ്ങൽ സൗകര്യങ്ങൾ; കർഷക സംഗമം, മെഡിക്കൽ അല്ലെങ്കിൽ വെറ്റിനറി പരിശോധനകൾ ഉൾപ്പെടെയുള്ള ഭാവി പരിപാടികളെക്കുറിച്ചുള്ള വിവരങ്ങളിലേക്കുള്ള ആക്സസ്; അതോടൊപ്പം തന്നെ കുടുതല്.

 

ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ-ലെ പേയ്‌മെന്റുകളെക്കുറിച്ച്

കാർഷിക മേഖലയ്‌ക്കായുള്ള മുൻനിര ഓൺലൈൻ ഷോപ്പിംഗ് വെബ്‌സൈറ്റുകളിലൊന്നായ ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ, ക്രെഡിറ്റ് അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ഡെബിറ്റ് കാർഡും ഇന്റർനെറ്റ് ബാങ്കിംഗും ഉൾപ്പെടെയുള്ള ഓൺലൈൻ പേയ്‌മെന്റുകൾ പ്രോസസ്സ് ചെയ്യുന്നതിനുള്ള സുരക്ഷിതവും സുരക്ഷിതവുമായ വഴികൾക്കൊപ്പം ക്യാഷ് ഓൺ ഡെലിവറി വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യുന്നു. നിങ്ങളുടെ പേയ്‌മെന്റ് വിവരങ്ങൾക്ക് പൂർണ്ണമായും സുരക്ഷിതമായ ഇടപാടുകളും രഹസ്യസ്വഭാവവും ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ ഉറപ്പ് നൽകുന്നു. ഈ സവിശേഷതകളും അതിലേറെയും ഉപയോഗിച്ച്, ഇന്ത്യൻ കർഷകർക്ക് അവരുടെ ബിസിനസിന്റെ നിയന്ത്രണം ഏറ്റെടുക്കാൻ അവരെ പ്രാപ്തരാക്കുന്ന മികച്ച സേവനങ്ങൾ വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്യാൻ ഞങ്ങൾ പ്രതിജ്ഞാബദ്ധരാണ്. ഇതുമൂലം, ഇഫ്‌കോ ബസാർ സ്ഥാപിതമായതിനുശേഷം ചുരുങ്ങിയ സമയത്തിനുള്ളിൽ ഇന്ത്യയിലെ മികച്ച ഓൺലൈൻ കാർഷിക വിപണിയായി.
seo_content_home.te:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agricultural market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilisers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio-stimulants, sprayers, and other agricultural implements and farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.iffcobazar.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’. It offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agricultural market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agricultural uses, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offer the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agricultural market in India in the short time since its establishment.

seo_content_home.pu:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agricultural market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilisers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio-stimulants, sprayers, and other agricultural implements and farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.iffcobazar.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’. It offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agricultural market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agricultural uses, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offer the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agricultural market in India in the short time since its establishment.
